Pre-Game Insights: India started their World Cup 2023 campaign with a win over Australia
Afghanistan lost to Bangladesh in their tournament opener
India will be without Shubman Gill due to dengue
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Arun Jaitley Stadium has been a stronghold for India
India has won the last six ODIs out of the seven hosted at the venue since 2005
Others: The match will be played on 11th October, 2023 at 2:00 PM at the Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi
Squads for both teams have been provided
